plot outline: Jagira is the story of those unfortunate people harassed by time and the society and above all the victims of the oppressors. But the law Keepers, the traitors instead of helping the victims made them the guilty. Whenever such injustice has been done on the face of the earth, then there is always the birth of a Jagira to answer them! Jagira shola & Ramkali effects of Mahakals crime. So all are fight with Mahakal gang and finish them. Mahakal Shoot Shola.
title: Jagira
plot: _Jagira_ (qv) is the story of those unfortunate people harassed by time and the society and above all the victims of the oppressors. But the law Keepers, the traitors instead of helping the victims made them the guilty. Whenever such injustice has been done on the face of the earth, then there is always the birth of a _Jagira_ (qv) to answer them! _Jagira_ (qv) shola & Ramkali effects of Mahakals crime. So all are fight with Mahakal gang and finish them. Mahakal Shoot Shola.
